name: The Quest to Kill a Dragon
name_original: The Quest to Kill a Dragon
description:
In this choose your own destiny game, you take on the role of a dude or dudette who wants to be rich.  and you know who else is rich?  that's right, Dragons!

So, in this quest, you find yourself setting out, without a map, to find and slay a dragon..   Who knows what you'll find along the way.

With many different outcomes, and few of them good, it's up to your own choices as to whether you encounter a dragon, or encounter a sticky demise!

(note there are 4 endings to this game 1 of them is very hard to get!)
